summary: Diff implements a new /checkout route with a 3-step CheckoutPage, updates Cart CTA to navigate to checkout, and adds INR currency formatting via a new formatINR utility used across several pages. Backend order model is extended to include an optional address field with a migration. However, backend changes shown do not implement a structured delivery address type nor persistence of the chosen payment option on the order record (both required).

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores the payment option chosen on the order record.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend passes a paymentMethod to checkout, but the backend Order type shown only adds an optional address field; no payment method field is evident in the order model or migration.

missing_requirements.requirement: Persist a structured delivery address type (with the requested fields) with each created order; checkout API should accept the delivery address and persist it.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend adds `address : ?Text` rather than a structured delivery address record/type containing the required fields (full name, mobile, pincode, address lines, landmark, city, state). Frontend also serializes the address into a single string before sending.

hallucinated_features.description: Persisting the checkout address in sessionStorage for client-side persistence.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; the requirements only specify saving/validating before continuing, not storing address in sessionStorage.
